mapper.insert: insert into t_menu (name, linkUrl, path, priority, icon, description, parentMenuId, level) VALUES (#{name},#{linkUrl},#{path},#{priority},#{icon},#{description},#{parentMenuId},#{level})
mapper.select:
select * from t_menu
where name like concat('%',#{queryString},'%')
mapper.update: update t_menu set name=#{name}, linkUrl=#{linkUrl}, path=#{path}, priority=#{priority}, icon=#{icon}, description=#{description}, parentMenuId=#{parentMenuId}, level=#{level} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select id from t_menu where id=#{menuId} and level=1
select * from t_menu where path LIKE CONCAT('/',#{path},'%')
select id from t_menu where path = (select substring((select path from t_menu where id = #{menuId}),2,1))
